original_text: Now Judas went immediately to Jesus. He said, ‘Hello, Teacher.’ Then he kissed Jesus in a friendly way.
korean_text: 곧 예수께 나아와 랍비여 안녕하시옵니까 하고 입을 맞추니

sentences.original_text: Now Judas went immediately to Jesus.
Then he kissed Jesus in a friendly way.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 친근한 방식으로 예수에게 입을 맞췄습니다.
